sentence: Colgate-Palmolive Company ( CL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on October 15, 2014.
A cash dividend payment of $0.36 per share is scheduled to be paid on November 14, 2014.
Shareholders who purchased CL stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 3rd quarter that CL has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $64.19, the dividend yield is 2.24%.
The previous trading day's last sale of CL was $64.19, representing a -8.44% decrease from the 52 week high of $70.11 and a 7.43% increase over the 52 week low of $59.75.
CL is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
CL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $2.39.
Zacks Investment Research reports CL's forecasted earnings growth in 2014 as 3.47%, compared to an industry average of 1.3%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the CL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
